sentences.sContent: She is the deputy headmistress of the school.
sentences.sContent_eng: She is the deputy headmistress of the school.
sentences.sCn: 她是那所学校的代理校长。

sentences.sContent: I was called to account for my conduct by the headmistress.
sentences.sContent_eng: I was called to account for my conduct by the headmistress.
sentences.sCn: 我因为行为不检点而受到女校长的斥责。

trans.tranOther: a female teacher who is in charge of a school
